transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good morning sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Haan bhai batao.
Executive: Sir kuch issue aa raha tha Shubham bata raha tha aapko ye data ko leke aapke.
Customer: Kisko leke?
Executive: API aap keh rahe the na ki aapko jo purana data hai wo aapke CRM me chahiye. Aapka CRM integrated hai?
Customer: CRM integrated hai. Maine inko kal call kiya tha. Maine unhe ye bataya tha ki bhai mujhe na last 365 din ka apna data chahiye. Iske liye aapke yaha Sonal mam hai unse meri baat ho gayi thi. To unhone bola mai bata deti hu usko. Maine Shubham ko bola tha ki aap jaake baat kar lo ye kaise karte hai.
Executive: Sir abhi Shubham ke according, mere according purana data to, ek second, purana data to sir shayad nahi hota hai.
Customer: Ho jata hai.
Executive: To aapko ek baar pata karna padega aur ho jayega to sir kara denge hume koi problem nahi hai. Sir aapne fir customer care number pe call kiya aapko pata hi hai ki sir ticket open hota hai.
Customer: Bhai maine kal 10 baar phone kiya Shubham ko ye cheez bolne ke liye mujhe data urgent chahiye.
Executive: Shubham ko kiya sir ne tumhe?
Customer: Pucho.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: To sir aap thoda sa agar hume ek baar aapko aisa lagta hai na sir agar koi issue resolve nahi ho to hume call kar lijiye sir directly aapke paas mera number bhi hai.
Executive: Mere paas tumhara number nahi hai. Shubham ko maine 10 baar bola 6 baje jaate jaate ye bola Shubham ne mujhe assurance diya hai ki sir aapke paas abhi call aa jayega wo.
Executive: Haan sir aapko pata hi hai 6 baje tak office hota hai. Pehla din hai aapko sir sab baatein jaante hai yaha ki saari cheeze jaante hai aap hum aapke.
Customer: Meri baat suno. Unhone mujhe bola ki aapke paas 6 baje call aa jayega.
Executive: 6 baje call aa jayega?
Customer: Haan aur ho jayega aapka kaam.
Executive: Kisne bola aapko?
Customer: Shubham ne.
Executive: Chaliye sir koi nahi ab mai iska ek kaam karta hu. Iska solution mai aapko.
Customer: Ticket nahi dena hai mujhe koi meri baat suno mujhe ticket open karne ka koi shauk nahi hai. Maine char panch baar phone kiya unhe aur maine unhe bataya mujhe bahut urgent chahiye data ki dena hai kisi ko aage.
Executive: Wo baat theek hai agar aap call kar rahe ho aur wo respond nahi kar rahe to to aap kar hi sakte ho lekin mai sir keh raha hu kabhi koi problem ho to aap ek baar mere ko call kar liya karo.
Customer: Mere paas tumhara number nahi hai ek baar meri baat samjho mere bhai mai kyu bol raha hu ek baar dobara samjhao. Maine na ek CRM integrate karaya hai ZNI CRM, theek hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Agar aap koi bhi CRM lete ho na to ek hafte tak ye CRM free hota hai aur ek hafte ke baad iska charge hota hai 10000 rupaye saal ka, theek hai?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: To ab ye kya hai ye mera na aaj jo aaj iska seventh day hai aaj iska jo hai ye free pack khatam ho jayega. Uske baad fir ya to mujhe 10000 rupaye pay karne padenge.
Customer: Nahi to fir wo kya hoga data mere paas aa nahi payega. To mujhe kya maine iske liye Sonal aapke yaha Sonal mam hai jo CH hai unse meri baat ho gayi hai wo keh rahi hai mai bata dungi bahut aasan hai ye. Keh rahi hai unko mere paas bhej dena mai ek second me samjha dungi kaise hota hai. Maine Shubham ko ek baat boli thi ki aap jaake Sonal mam se mil lo meri unse baat ho gayi hai sir puch lena ki mam kaise hoga wo bata denge to mujhe bata dena. Itna sa kaam hai.
Executive: Suno sir.
Customer: Aapko purana mai agar aapko koi solution bhi mai de raha hu ki bhai bas jaake puchna hai aapko. Beta slipper maro utar.
Executive: Sir hamare hamare paas bhi CH hai sir Sonal mam ki tarah hum bhi KCD me kaam karte hai Sonal mam bhi KCD me kaam karti hai. Mai apne number se aapko whatsapp bhi karta hu. Aapko kabhi koi problem aata hai future aapko mai apne number whatsapp kar raha hu aap us number pe call kar lijiye mera number save kar lijiye mai bhi whatsapp kar raha hu.
Customer: Lekin ye please abhi karwa do mere liye bahut urgent hai bhai ye.
Executive: Theek hai nahi mai koi update deta hu aapko is bare me 10-15 minute me call back karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs last 365 days data.

- CRM integration expiring, needs urgent assistance.

- Frustrated with lack of response from Shubham.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to provide an update in 10-15 minutes.

- Executive shared his WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- crm, data, integration, urgent
